404_2: Do not panic, we can help you.
SECURITY_CODE_MANDATORY: The security code is mandatory for create an operator account
PLAYERPIP_TOOLTIP: Hold the window in a screen corner
ENGINEALLOWDUPLICATESSERIES: Allow songs with duplicate series or singers in playlists
ENGINEFREEUPVOTES: Allow users to upvote songs to free them
ENGINEFREEUPVOTESREQUIREDMIN: Minimum votes required to free a song
ENGINEFREEUPVOTESREQUIREDPERCENT: Percentage of upvotes / online users required to to free a song

SYSTEMPANEL_TIP.QUESTION: You can't find the options you searched?
SYSTEMPANEL_TIP.RESPONSE: Some options are now in the

ENGINESONGPOLLCHOICES: Number of songs users can choose from during public poll
STREAM_TWITCH_OAUTH_TOKEN_GET: Get your OAuth Token Twitch here
CLASSIC_MODE_TOOLTIP: A pause will take place between each song and the name of the next song as well as its requester will be displayed on the screen. The song requester or operator will be able to start playing the song
CLASSIC_MODE_TEXT_MODAL: Click on the Play button to start your song.

ADVANCED.DELETE_PUBLIC: This list is defined as public, change the public playlist for another to delete this one.
ADVANCED.DELETE_CURRENT: This list is defined as current , change the current playlist for another to delete this one.
ADVANCED.DELETE_CURRENT_PUBLIC: This list is defined as current and public, change the current and public playlist for another to delete this one.

KARA_MENU.FREE: Free this kara from user's quota
KARA_MENU.TRANSFER_KARA: Transfer this song - right click to transfer it after the currently playing song

BLC.DELETE_CURRENT: This list is defined as current , change the current criterias list for another to delete this one.
BLC.COPY_TO: Copy criterias to the following list :

PUBLIC_HOMEPAGE.RESTRICTED_DESCRIPTION: Karaoke is in restricted mode, additions are limited.

CL_HELP_DISCORD: Come to our {{- discord}} if you have any questions!
CL_ADD_RANDOM_TITLE: How many random songs do you want to add?
CL_DELETE_CRITERIAS_PLAYLIST: Delete criterias blacklist of type '{{type}}' that contains all this songs :
GOTO_TOP: Go to the start of the playlist
GOTO_PLAYING: Go to the kara currently playing
GOTO_BOTTOM: Go to the end of the playlist

LOG_OFFLINE.TITLE: Instance offline
LOG_OFFLINE.MESSAGE: Changes to your profile will not be registered

CONFIRM_FAV_IMPORT: Overwrite your favorites with this import?
LOGIN_SLOGAN: Login with an account to suggest songs.
TOOLTIP_ADDKARA: Add this song to the playlist
TOOLTIP_ADDKARA_ADMIN: right click to append it after the currently playing song
TOOLTIP_ADD_SELECT_KARA: Add selected songs to the playlist - right click to append it after the currently playing song
TOOLTIP_TRANSFER_SELECT_KARA: Transfer selected songs - right click to transfer it after the currently playing song

KARAOKE.LABEL: Karaoke
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_RANDOMSONGSAFTEREND_TOOLTIP: At the end of your current playlist, Karaoke Mugen will play random songs from the library until someone adds a song (if autoplay is enabled)
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_RANDOMSONGSAFTERENDMESSAGE: Display an on-screen message regularly to invite users to add a song when randomly playing after playlist end
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_INTRO_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Intro videos are played only once if you start playing the first song of the current playlist. A sponsor jingle video follows, if available.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_OUTRO_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: Outro videos are played only once after the last song of the current playlist.
KARAOKE.PLAYLIST_ENCORES_VIDEOS_TOOLTIP: This video will played before the last song of the current playlist.
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_ADMIN_TOOLTIP: Should songs added by the operator be visible to the public or considered mystery songs?
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_PUBLIC_TOOLTIP: Should songs added by the public be visible to the public or considered mystery songs?
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_ADMIN_ON: Songs will be added as mystery songs (you can define these songs label in settings)
KARAOKE.ADDED_SONG_VISIBILITY_ADMIN_OFF: Songs will be added normally (visible to the public)
KARAOKE.MINUTES_BEFORE_SESSION_ENDS_WARNING: Display warning on end of session X minutes before end
KARAOKE.ENABLE_SMARTINSERT: Enable smart insert of songs to avoid user monopolies
KARAOKE.ENABLE_SMARTINSERT_TOOLTIP: When a song is added by the audience, it will be placed so that those who have not requested a lot of songs to be play earlier
KARAOKE.ENABLE_AUTOBALANCE_TOOLTIP: The playlist will be reorganized regularly so that user requests take turns.

ENDOFPLAYLISTACTION.NAME: End of playlist action
ENDOFPLAYLISTACTION.TOOLTIP: If you choose Random Songs, they'll be picked from your song library. Combined with AutoPlay, your playlist can resume as soon as someone adds a new song.

OPTIONS.RANDOM: Play random songs from the library

QUOTA_AVAILABLE: You can add songs again now!
FREE_AUTO_TIME: Songs are freed from quota after (min)
KARA_SUGGESTION_NOT_FOUND: Can't find your favorite song?  Check your configured online repositories as well as the suggestions site if your wish has not already been granted:

ONLINE_STATS.TITLE: Stats
ONLINE_STATS.INTRO: Karaoke Mugen can send anonymous information about your instance to Karaoke Mugen Server to establish usage statistics.

DETAILS.1: Which karaokes are favorited (but not by whom)
DETAILS.3: Which karaokes gott requested (but not by whom)
DETAILS.4: Information about the computer (CPU, available RAM, OS name and version ...)
DETAILS.5: Application' settings (excluding any private info like password)
DETAILS.TITLE: Details of sent informations
DETAILS.OUTRO: Stats are sent at each startup, then at each hour of use. You can consult the information sent in the Karaoke Mugen log directory.

ONLINE_STATS.CHANGE: You can change your choice at any time from the options.
ONLINE_STATS.QUESTION: Do you agree to send these statistics to Karaoke Mugen Server?
ONLINE_STATS.ERROR: Karaoke Mugen may send information about your instance to Sentry.io during errors. This helps us solve them as they come up much faster. Do you agree to send these error reports?

SELECT_KARAS_REQUIRED: You have to select at least one song
MAKE_ACCOUNT_ADMIN_MESSAGE: If you want to make your account an operator account, write the 6 numbers security code and validate.
INTRO_ADMIN_EMAIL_ONLINE: When creating an online account, remember to modify your profile to add an email address so that you can recover your password if you forget it!
INTRO_ADMIN_INTRO3:
Your Karaoke Mugen is configured, we are now going to show you how it works.

To redo this guided tour, go to the config page, toggle the App.FirstRun setting.
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS: Here are your playlists. You can manage them from this screen. We will learn more on them later.
INTRO_ADMIN_LECTEUR:
Here is the control panel.
You can manage your karaoke as you wish.
Pick songs from your collection and add them to a playlist, then press Play to test it out.
INTRO_ADMIN_MYSTERY:
You can choose to add invisible or visible songs to your guests by choosing Normal or Mystery Add. Perfect for surprises!

You can limit the public interface usage here. The restricted mode keeps your guests from adding songs, but they can still see the current playlist.
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_2:
But let's go back to playlists.
There are several types :

- The Library is your song database. This is where your users are going to search for songs they want to add.

- The list with the Current attribute is the one displayed on the screen.

- The list with the Public attribute is the one where your public will enter their suggestions.

- Lists with a hidden attribute are invisible to your public. Disable it if you want to hide some lists!
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_MANAGE: Here, you can choose which playlist to display, change its properties or search inside.
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_MANAGE_BUTTON:
This button allows you to show advanced actions.
Press it to continue.
INTRO_ADMIN_PLAYLISTS_MANAGE_ADVANCED: All possible actions on a playlist are listed here.
INTRO_ADMIN_SETTINGS:
Your karaoke session is very customizable via its options panel.
You can access it by pressing the K button and then selecting Options.
INTRO_ADMIN_SETTINGS_SCREEN:
This is where you can configure Karaoke Mugen. Try out different settings to see what suits you best.
Some of them will only be taken into account after the current song ends.
INTRO_ADMIN_INTRO_DOWNLOAD:
Note : to be able to use the public interface, your users will need to be on the same Wifi network as you.

If you want more songs than the default ones provided here, go to the system panel to browse through the online database and choose which songs you'd like to get, or download everything.
INTRO_ADMIN_INTROFINAL:
We're done! You can now sing!

Thanks for reading this far. We are now going to disable the Dummy Plug System so you can pilot your EV... karaoke.

Read more :

- Documentation
- FAQ
- Contact the team (twitter / discord)
USER_SONG_PLAYS_IN: Your song {{kara}} has been added and will airing in {{time}} ({{date}})

UNKNOW_KARAS.TITLE: Unknown songs detected
UNKNOW_KARAS.DESCRIPTION: This playlist contains songs you do not have yet locally. We found them on your configured online repositories. These songs won't appear in the playlist until they've been downloaded.
UNKNOW_KARAS.DOWNLOAD_THEM: Do you want to download them?

MODAL.PLAY_CURRENT_MODAL: Warning : the current playlist '{{playlist}}' isn't displayed on screen. That's the playlist going to be played. Are you sure you want to start playing?

PROFILE_MODAL.ONLINE_DELETE_WARN: This will remove your account from the online server @{{instance}}. Are you sure you want to do this?
PROFILE_MODAL.LOCAL_DELETE_WARN: This will remove your account from this local app only. If you have an online account, it won't be disabled. Are you sure you want to do this?

SHUFFLE_MODAL.TITLE: Shuffle playlist
SHUFFLE_MODAL.LABEL: Shuffling does not affects songs already played. Choose a method to shuffle the playlist:
SHUFFLE_MODAL.SHUFFLE_DESC: The playlist will be shuffled randomly, without any influence applied to the mix
SHUFFLE_MODAL.SMART_SHUFFLE_DESC: Prevents long songs or songs by the same person from following each other
SHUFFLE_MODAL.BALANCE_DESC: Reorders songs by pools of users (A-B-C, A-B-C, etc.)

SETUP_PAGE.TITLE: Setup Wizard
SETUP_PAGE.NEED_ACCOUNT: Before you can start singing, you'll need an account to use the app.
SETUP_PAGE.ACCOUNT_QUESTION: Do you want to use a local account (on your computer only) or an online account (Internet access required)?
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_DESC: An online account allows you to:
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_SAVE_INFOS: Backup your favorite songs, avatar and profile info to get them again from one computer to another.
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_LOST_PASSWORD: If you supply an email address, you'll be able to recover your account if you forget your password.
SETUP_PAGE.LOCAL_ACCOUNT_DESC: You chose a local account. Type in an account name and a password below:
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_INSTANCE: Yout online account will be hosted on the {{instance}} instance
SETUP_PAGE.ONLINE_ACCOUNT_INSTANCE_DESC: An instance is an online service providing several services to Karaoke Mugen. If you're not sure, leave the default instance ({{instance}}), or if you know what you're doing, change it to the instance of your choice.
SETUP_PAGE.CREATE_ONLINE_ACCOUNT: I want to create a new account
SETUP_PAGE.CREATE_ONLINE_ACCOUNT_DESC: Type in an account name and a password to create one.
SETUP_PAGE.SECURITY_CODE_DESC_ELECTRON: Please also enter the 6-digit security code that you can find in the "Security Code" menu from the app's menu bar.
SETUP_PAGE.SECURITY_CODE_DESC_CONSOLE: Please also enter the 6-digit security code that you can find by looking for "SECURITY CODE FOR THIS SESSION" in the Karaoke Mugen log file or in the console.
SETUP_PAGE.SECURITY_CODE_USE: This code makes sure you're really the one doing these actions. It changes after each use.
SETUP_PAGE.CONNECTED_MESSAGE: Congratulations, you're logged in to Karaoke Mugen, {{user}}!
SETUP_PAGE.DEFAULT_REPOSITORY_DESC_1: Karaoke Mugen has a default karaokes repository,
SETUP_PAGE.DEFAULT_REPOSITORY_QUESTION: Where do you want to store these downloads? By default they'll be in:
SETUP_PAGE.REPOSITORY_NEED_SPACE: To download all the content from that repository, you'll need a lot of disk space (up to several hundred gigabytes). You can change this folder at any time.
SETUP_PAGE.DOWNLOAD_RANDOM_SONGS: Do you want Karaoke Mugen to download 6 songs at random from the default repository ({{instance}})? This will allow you to test the app with a few songs before downloading new ones..

ERROR.PLAYER_RANDOM_SONG_AFTER_PLAYLIST: Unable to select a random song to play after playlist ends
ERROR.POLL_ALREADY_STARTED: A poll is already in progress
ERROR.POLL_PUBLIC_PL_EMPTY: Unable to start poll: public playlist is empty
ERROR.POLL_NOT_ENOUGH_SONGS: Unable to start poll: not enough songs available

INFO.POLL_WINNER: People voted for a new song!
INFO.END_OF_SESSION_NEAR: The karaoke session should end in {{data}} minutes.

LOADING_SUBTITLE: It shouldn't take too long, try to clear your cache or update your browser if you get stuck here.
LOADING_SUBTITLE_ELECTRON: It shouldn't take too long, try to restart Karaoke Mugen or update it if you get stuck here.

KARA.TITLE: Song title
KARA.TITLE_TOOLTIP: If you don't know, put the name of the series here as well
KARA.SERIES_TOOLTIP: TV series, movie title, video game title, etc.
KARA.SERIES_SINGERS_REQUIRED: Series or singers cannot be empty in the same time.
KARA.ORDER_TOOLTIP: Opening/Ending number. If this is the only opening/ending in the series, leave blank.
KARA.YEAR_TOOLTIP: Year when the series was broadcasted or the video was produced
KARA.CREATORS_TOOLTIP: Entity that created the series. Can be animation studio, movie studio, or game studio
KARA.KARA_AUTHORS_REQUIRED: Author of the kara is mandatory
KARA.GROUPS_TOOLTIP: Download groups for this song. The song will be included in these download packs
KARA.SYNCHRONIZE_DESC: Performs all of the actions below.
KARA.UPDATE_ALL_DESC: Download only updates to songs already downloaded.
KARA.CLEAN_ALL_DESC: Deletes songs that no longer exist on the remote repository (s).
KARA.DOWNLOAD_ALL_TOOLTIP: Download all retrieved karas at once

BATCH_EDIT.CREATE_PLAYLIST: First, you need to create a playlist in the operator panel.

USERS.PASSWORD_VALIDATOR_MESSAGE: A user must have a password
USERS.EDIT_ONLINE_ACCOUNT: Online users cannot be edited from this page except to change their role on this instance of Karaoke Mugen. To edit your own profile online, do this from the public or operator interface.

DATABASE.REGENERATE_DB_DESCRIPTION:
Regenerate database. Generation makes Karaoke Mugen aware of all the files you have in your data folders.

This is usually done when the app starts, but you may want to do this manually if :
  • You added a repository and put files inside already
  • You modified files outside the app
DATABASE.VALIDATE_FILES_DESCRIPTION: Validate all files in all enabled repositories to fix them if necessary. Maintainer use only.
DATABASE.UPDATE_MEDIA_DESCRIPTION: Karaoke repository mantainers only : If you keep your base updated through git (advanced users) this will download all medias to keep you up to date. You should rather use the download manager to get new songs.
DATABASE.DUMP_DATABASE_DESCRIPTION: Creates a karaokemugen.sql backup file in your data folder. This file can be used to create a restore point ou to send your database to the devs if they ask you to do so.
DATABASE.RESTORE_DATABASE_DESCRIPTION:
Restores your database from the file karaokemugen.sql if it's present in your data folder.

**WARNING : This will overwrite ALL non-saved data in your database : playlists, sessions, etc.)
DATABASE.UPDATE_MESSAGE_FILES: any file not in the official Karaoke Mugen repository
DATABASE.UPDATE_MESSAGE_DELETED: If you created karaokes but did not upload them, they will be deleted.

TAGS.NAME: Original name
TAGS.NAME_TOOLTIP: This is the internal name used to reference the tags in Karaoke Mugen's database
TAGS.SHORT_NAME_TOOLTIP: This is the short name used to reference the tags in Karaoke Mugen's database
TAGS.TYPES_TOOLTIP: This is the type of the tag in Karaoke Mugen's database
TAGS.ALIASES_TOOLTIP: Short names or alternative names of a tag could be searched.
TAGS.I18N_TOOLTIP: There must be at least one name in any language (enter the original name by default)
TAGS.MERGE_WITH_TOOLTIP: Merge the current tag with another one
TAGS.MERGE_ABOUT_MESSAGE: Resulting tags will have the current Name and Shortname. Types, Aliases and translation will be merged and the resulting tags will contain all the information from Current and targeted tags
TAGS.DELETE_TAG_MESSAGE: This will remove its tags.json file as well as in any .kara.json in your database!
TAGS.LANG_ERROR: A tag must have at least one name by language
TAGS.PROBLEMATIC_TOOLTIP: Is this tag problematic? Should it be a tag you'd want to ban? This helps mark some songs more easily in the operator/public interface. For example R18, Spoiler, or Epilepsy
TAGS.NOLIVEDOWNLOAD_TOOLTIP: Karaokes with this tag won't be able to be downloaded on KMServer from the web interface, or visible on Live
TAGS.PRIORITY_TOOLTIP: Tags with a higher value will be displayed first. 0 by default.

CONFIG.MESSAGE: To modify a setting, just edit it and press enter. Not all settings are editable and will return an error if you try anywyay.

PROPERTIES.APP_QUICKSTART_TOOLTIP: This disables data verification. You will have to generate your database in case of modification manually from the system panel, database tab.
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_ERRORTRACKING: Send error and crash reports (via sentry.io)
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_STATS: Send usage telemetry to Karaoke Mugen Online
PROPERTIES.PLAYER_HARDWAREDECODING_TOOLTIP: Forces or not the player's hardware acceleration. Note: on some configurations, it can cause unexpected behavior during playback. In such cases, select "Disabled". The "Automatic" option is the safest, and "Force" the most risky/not recommended
PROPERTIES.ONLINE_DISCORD_DISPLAYACTIVITY: Show Karaoke Mugen activity on your Discord profile
PROPERTIES.PLAYER_PROGRESSBARDOCK: Play progress bar in Dock / Taskbar

SESSIONS.SESSION_EXPORTED_DESC: Download session data by clicking on the following links
SESSIONS.SESSION_EXPORT_PLAYED_COUNT: Karaoke played (grouped by number of times played)
SESSIONS.SESSION_EXPORT_REQUESTED_COUNT: Karaoke requested (grouped by number of times played)
SESSIONS.NAME: Name
SESSIONS.TITLE: Title
SESSIONS.MERGE_WITH_TOOLTIP: Merge the current session with another one

REPOSITORIES.NAME: Repository name
REPOSITORIES.NAME_TOOLTIP: If it's an online repository, put its domaine name only here. If it's a local repository, name it as you want. For example 'My private little karaokes'
REPOSITORIES.MOVE_TOOLTIP: This allows you to define which repositories take priority when creating your database: the highest repositories will be taken into account first if two repositories have the same karaoke
REPOSITORIES.CONSOLIDATE_ABOUT_MESSAGE: All repository fiels (karaokes, medias, series, tags...) will be moved to the new folder as their root. If your repository has several folders for the same type of data (several media folders for example), all filles of all folders will be moved into the same target folder. If there are duplicate files, they'll be savagely overwritten.
REPOSITORIES.COMPARE_ABOUT_MESSAGE: This will allow you to compare then eventually copy lyric files from one repository to another if they differ between the two same songs. Select a repository to compare lyrics with (it will be the destination repository when comes time to copy lyrics)
REPOSITORIES.LYRICS_ARE_DIFFERENT: The lyrics of these karaokes are different between the {{first}} repository and the {{second}} repository:
REPOSITORIES.CONFIRM_SURE: Do you want to synchronize the lyrics of repository {{second}} with those of repository {{first}}?

HOME.WELCOME: Welcome to Karaoke Mugen's system panel
HOME.DIFFERENTS_MENUS: Here are the different menus you can use :
HOME.SYSTEM_DESCRIPTION: See logs, change configuration options, backup/restore your database, trigger a manual generation and manage karaoke session
HOME.KARAS_DESCRIPTION_3: , and create karaoke data files. You can also edit the download blacklist and view most requested, most played, and karaoke history
HOME.TAGS_DESCRIPTION: Manage tags (singers, songwriters, creators, song types, etc.)
HOME.USERS_DESCRIPTION_3: , change passwords, make new guests account

TASKS.CLEANING_REPO: Cleaning up songs removed from repository

ERROR_CODES.WEBAPPMODE_CLOSED_API_MESSAGE: API is disabled at the moment
ERROR_CODES.BLC_EMPTY_ERROR: Error emptying list of blacklist criterias
ERROR_CODES.BL_VIEW_ERROR: Blacklist view is not allowed for users
ERROR_CODES.BLC_VIEW_FORBIDDEN: Blacklist criterias could not be viewed
ERROR_CODES.BLC_VIEW_ERROR: Blacklist criterias view is not allowed for users
ERROR_CODES.BLC_ADD_ERROR: Blacklist criteria could not be added
ERROR_CODES.PL_ADD_SONG_ERROR: No songs could be added, all are in destination playlist already
ERROR_CODES.PL_MOVE_SONG_ERROR: Unable to copy song to the destination playlist
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_QUEUED_ERROR: Error adding downloads to the queue
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_QUEUED_ALREADY_ADDED_ERROR: No downloads added, all are already in queue or running
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_GET_ERROR: Error getting downloads from the queue
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOADS_WIPE_ERROR: Error wiping downloads from the queue
ERROR_CODES.AUTOMIX_ERROR_NOT_FOUND_FAV_FOR_USERS: No favorites found for those users
ERROR_CODES.KARA_HISTORY_ERROR: Error getting songs sorted by date played
ERROR_CODES.KARA_RANKING_ERROR: Error getting songs sorted by most requested
ERROR_CODES.KARA_PLAYED_ERROR: Error getting songs sorted by most played
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_ALREADY_ADD: This song has already been added
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_QUOTA_REACH: Can't add any song, quota reached
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_NO_DUPLICAT: No duplicate series or singers are allowed
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR_BLACKLISTED: Song is blacklisted and cannot be added
ERROR_CODES.PLAYLIST_MODE_ADD_SONG_ERROR: Error adding a song to a playlist
ERROR_CODES.SONG_COPIED_ERROR: Error copying song to another repository
ERROR_CODES.TAG_COPIED_ERROR: Error copying tag to another repository
ERROR_CODES.CONFIG_BACKUPED_ERROR: Error during backup of configuration file
ERROR_CODES.USER_DELETE_ADMIN_DAMEDESU: You can't remove the admin user!
ERROR_CODES.USER_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_SING: User not allowed to start the song
ERROR_CODES.PL_LIST_ERROR: Error fetching a list of playlists
ERROR_CODES.PL_VIEW_ERROR: Error fetching info from a playlist
ERROR_CODES.PL_SET_CURRENT_ERROR: Error setting a playlist to current
ERROR_CODES.PL_SET_PUBLIC_ERROR: Error setting a playlist to public
ERROR_CODES.PL_SONG_COPY_ERROR: Error copying a song to the destination playlist
ERROR_CODES.PL_MODIFY_CONTENT_ERROR: Error modifying content's position or playing status
ERROR_CODES.UPVOTE_NO_SELF: Unable to upvote one of your own additions
ERROR_CODES.DOWNVOTE_NO_SELF: Unable to downvote one of your own additions
ERROR_CODES.SESSION_END_BEFORE_START_ERROR: Session end is before its beginning!
ERROR_CODES.ADMIN_CONVERT_ERROR: The account 'admin' cannot be converted to an online account
ERROR_CODES.USER_RESETPASSWORD_ONLINE_ERROR: Could not reset your password: contact the the server's administrator your account belongs to.
ERROR_CODES.DOWNLOAD_SONGS_ERROR: Repository {{repo}} failed to download all songs properly: {{err}}
ERROR_CODES.CLEAN_SONGS_ERROR: Repository {{repo}} failed to clean songs properly: {{err}}
ERROR_CODES.SONGS_UPDATE_ERROR: Repository {{repo}} failed to update songs properly: {{err}}
ERROR_CODES.UPDATING_MEDIAS_ERROR: Repository {{repo}} failed to update medias properly: {{err}}
ERROR_CODES.REPO_COMPARE_LYRICS_ERROR: Error comparing lyrics between two repositories
ERROR_CODES.REPO_COPY_LYRICS_ERROR: Error copying lyrics between two repositories
ERROR_CODES.BLC_SET_CURRENT_ERROR: Error setting a blacklist criterias set to current
ERROR_CODES.BLC_COPY_ERROR: Error copying blacklist criterias to another set

SUCCESS_CODES.BASES_SYNC_IN_PROGRESS: Local and remote library sync in progress
SUCCESS_CODES.CLEAN_SONGS_IN_PROGRESS: Removing all local songs not on remote repositories
SUCCESS_CODES.SONG_COPIED: Successfully copied song to another repository
SUCCESS_CODES.TAG_COPIED: Successfully copied tag to another repository
SUCCESS_CODES.USER_DELETED_ONLINE: Your online account was successfully deleted
SUCCESS_CODES.USER_RESETPASSWORD_ONLINE: An email has been sent with a link to reset your password.
SUCCESS_CODES.REPO_LYRICS_COPIED: Copy lyrics between two repositories successfully finished
SUCCESS_CODES.STOP_AFTER: The karaoke will stop at the song end. To stop now, click again on the stop button.

HOME.TITLE: Home
HOME.DESCRIPTION: This is where it all begins.

LOGS.TITLE: Logs
LOGS.DESCRIPTION: Everything you never wanted to know about how your karaoke works.

CONFIGURATION.TITLE: Advanced configuration
CONFIGURATION.DESCRIPTION: For experts only. All Karaoke Mugen settings are here, be careful where you put your fingers.

SESSIONS.TITLE: Session management
SESSIONS.DESCRIPTION: Add, remove, or view data from the different Karaoke sessions you have done.

REPOSITORIES.TITLE: Repositories management
REPOSITORIES.DESCRIPTION: Repositories are sources of karaoke. Add, enable, or remove repositories from this page.

UNUSED_FILES.TITLE: Unused files
UNUSED_FILES.DESCRIPTION: You can list unnecessary files (used by no karaoke) in your repositories from here.

DATABASE.TITLE: Database
DATABASE.DESCRIPTION: Database management tools. Database, database, just living in the database wow wow.

KARAOKE_LIST.TITLE: List of karaoke
KARAOKE_LIST.DESCRIPTION: From here you can edit, add or delete karaoke. Usually reserved for karaoke repository maintainers

KARAOKE_NEW.TITLE: Add a karaoke
KARAOKE_NEW.DESCRIPTION: This form allows you to add an already existing karaoke to one of your repositories.

DOWNLOAD.TITLE: Download manager
DOWNLOAD.DESCRIPTION: Find and get karaoke from your configured repositories.

DOWNLOAD_BLACKLIST.TITLE: Download blacklist
DOWNLOAD_BLACKLIST.DESCRIPTION: Set what you never want to download automatically. You can always download whatever you want manually.

HISTORY.TITLE: Reading history
HISTORY.DESCRIPTION: Lists all the karaoke played on your application, in descending chronological order.

MOST_REQUESTED.TITLE: Most Popular Songs
MOST_REQUESTED.DESCRIPTION: Lists the most requested songs on your application. Only takes into account karaoke songs added from the public interface.

MOST_PLAYED.TITLE: Most played songs
MOST_PLAYED.DESCRIPTION: List the most played songs on your application

KARATAG_BATCH_EDIT.TITLE: Bulk add / remove tag
KARATAG_BATCH_EDIT.DESCRIPTION: Reserved for maintainers: this page allows you to add or remove a tag on several karaokes simultaneously.

TAG_LIST.TITLE: List of tags
TAG_LIST.DESCRIPTION: List of tags composing the metadata of a karaoke, reserved for maintainers.

TAG_NEW.TITLE: Create a tag
TAG_NEW.DESCRIPTION: Tag creation form. Remember to add an English translation at least.

TAG_EDIT.TITLE: Modify a tag
TAG_EDIT.DESCRIPTION: Tag modification form. Only the original name change results in a file name change.

TAG_DUPLICATES.TITLE: List of duplicate tags
TAG_DUPLICATES.DESCRIPTION: This page allows you to see tags that have the same name but not the same category in order to merge them if necessary.

USER_LIST.TITLE: User management
USER_LIST.DESCRIPTION: From here you can create, delete, modify users, but also reset their password or change their rights
